processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value and add divisors to the sum

advice.text: Think in detail about the loop step: how will you check each candidate number and when to add it to the sum?
Refine the loop into two parts: iterate candidate numbers, and for each candidate check divisibility then update the running sum.
Add sub-comments inside the loop like 'for each i from 1 to n' and 'if i divides n then add i to sum', then translate those sub-comments into code and print the result.
